QuestData.Title: A Deadly Distraction
QuestData.Description:
Vyraz's assault on the House of Constructs may have failed, but we can still make them bleed now that we're inside.
Slaughter as many as you can. I will hunt down the masterminds behind these new production efforts.
QuestData.RewardText: Complacency is every soldier's worst enemy. No one is safe in times of war, not even within the walls of their own fortress.
